CustomField.formula: IF( NokiaCPQ_Account_Region__c = 'RG_NAM', Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.NokiaCPQ_Min_SM_North_America__c, IF( NokiaCPQ_Account_Region__c = 'RG_LAM', Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.NokiaCPQ_Min_SM_Latin_America__c, IF( NokiaCPQ_Account_Region__c = 'RG_MEA', Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.NokiaCPQMin_SM_Middle_East_and_Africa__c, IF( NokiaCPQ_Account_Region__c = 'RG_ASIA', IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.CountryCode__c ,'IN' ), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.CountryCode__c ,'BT' ), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Config2__ConfigurationId__r.Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.Apttus_Proposal__Account__r.CountryCode__c ,'NP' )), Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.NokiaCPQ_Min_SM_India__c,Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.NokiaCPQ_Min_SM_Asia_Pacific_Japan__c), IF( NokiaCPQ_Account_Region__c = 'RG_CHINA', Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.NokiaCPQ_Min_SM_Greater_China__c, IF( NokiaCPQ_Account_Region__c = 'RG_EUROPE', Apttus_Config2__OptionId__r.NokiaCPQ_Min_SM_Europe__c, 0 ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Minimum Sales Margin
